Class ScriptOutlineTransferHandler

      de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.gui.custom.ScriptOutlineTransferHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ScriptOutlineTransferHandler
extends javax.swing.TransferHandler

The Transfer Handler for the Outline Tree. Needed for DnD operations. In this case only dropping is supported,

canImport

public boolean canImport(javax.swing.TransferHandler.TransferSupport support)
Check what kind of data and DnD operation is supported. In this case: only strings // dropping

Overrides:
canImport in class javax.swing.TransferHandler

importData

public boolean importData(javax.swing.TransferHandler.TransferSupport support)
Check via "canImport" if the action/data is supported, then import the data. First get the commandModel from the dropped string, then add it to the OutlineTree and then import the command to the editor

Overrides:
importData in class javax.swing.TransferHandler
